title: Tim Burton @ ACMI : Highlights of Tim Burton's visit to ACMI
brief_description: This is a highlights package of Tim Burton’s time at ACMI. It showcases the events that Tim Burton participated in as well as the peripheral activities that occurred around the Exhibition set up and launch. A celebration of Tim Burton and the exhibition, it includes footage of Tim Burton meeting with the young tour guides, book signings, the masses that filled Federation Square to see the sold out event of Tim Burton’s Masterclass, Burton Club, Media Launch, Official Opening as well behind the scenes footage of installations such as the BatMobile and Balloon Boy.
